shortDesc: A ballroom with a giant chandelier. There is painted glass door on the east wall.
longDesc:
You see a very large room with finished hardwood flooring and tall glass windows on the north wall.
 There is a magnificent crystal chandelier hanging from the middle of the room ceiling. A grand piano and its bench are placed at one corner.
To the east wall is a beautifully painted glass door leading to the next room.
smell: There is a very slight citrus smell, left over from a recent mopping of the entire floor
sound: You hear the soft melody of piano strings being struck. The grand piano is playing itself
